title: Sanath Nishantha and Milan Jayathilake to be produced before court today
body_lines: SLPP MPs Sanath Nishantha and Milan Jayathilake, who were arrested in connection with the attack on the anti-government protest sites in Colombo on the 9th of May, are slated to be produced before the court today.
Meanwhile, Senior DIG in charge of Western Province Deshabandu Tennakoon has left the CID headquarters after his recording a statement over the recent unrest.
